item.title: Let's Encrypt - guide
item.description: Basics of Let’s Encrypt open and automated certificate authority Let’s Ecnrypt issues free SSL/TLS certificates Certbot - can automatically configure TLS/SSL on both Apache and Nginx web servers What is a Certificate Authority? Certificate authorities (CAs) are entities that cryptographically sign TLS/SSL certificates to vouch for their authenticity. 3-part process Install Certbot on your server Run Certbot with a command to obtain your SSL/TLS certificate and save it on your server.
